source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_SEQ_00<tab>Halldor believes you are ready to take an important step.
target: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_SEQ_00<tab>クリスタリウムのハルドルは、冒険者の活躍ぶりを喜んでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_001<tab>There <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is! The star hunter of Clan Nutsy <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>! Bagged yourself a goodly number of three-nut marks, have we?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_001<tab>おう、お前さん！
どうだ、上級のハントは？
命が危険に晒されてる感覚があって興奮するだろ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_002<tab>But it's not enough, is it? Don't deny it. Nay, you need to experience it all: the terrifying lows, the dizzying highs, the creamy middles! And they need it too, if not more─why else would those Eulmoran bastards offer bigger and bigger bounties?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_002<tab>モブとの戦いは死と隣り合わせで楽しい上に、倒せば報酬も出る！
無様に殺されればスポンサーである好事家どもが喜ぶ！
これこそ相互利益ってもんだろ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_003<tab>They're waiting for you to slip up, just once. To give them a spectacular death. But you won't go quietly, oh no─you'll bleed them for every last gil and then some!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_003<tab>それにしても、お前さんは強いなぁ。
まさか上級を相手にしても生きて帰ってくるとは思わなかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_004<tab>And soon you'll have the chance to do so on an entirely different scale. How, you ask? By slaying elite marks, that's how!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_004<tab>そこで、いよいよお前さんを、
「リスキーモブ」のハントに推薦してやろうと思ってる！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_005<tab>They're like nothing you've ever faced before. Wild and unpredictable, possessed of surpassing strength and guile. Many are the men who have left to slay such fiends, never to return.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_005<tab>リスキーモブってのはな、
上級のモブですら比較にならないほどの強さを持ったモブのことだ。
次元が違う、なんてもんじゃねえ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_006<tab>But their failures will only serve to season the dish that is your victory! The greater the risk, the greater the reward─extrinsic and intrinsic, no? Which is why you must speak with Xylle without further delay!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_006<tab>だが、きっとこれまで以上に命を危険に晒すことができるはずだ！
楽しいだろう、嬉しいだろう？
そうと決まれば、いっちょ「サイル」と話してこい！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_050<tab>Oh, it's you. Come to beg permission to hunt elite marks?
target: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_050<tab>あなたは……もしや、リスキーモブに挑戦するつもりですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_051<tab>That I cannot grant. Just the other day our very own leader fell in battle with such a beast. Torn to shreds and devoured─nary a trace remained to be buried.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_051<tab>残念ですが、承服することはできません。
先日も、我がクランの頭領であるナッツが、
リスキーモブに挑んで戦死したばかりなのですから……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_052<tab>I cannot in good conscience allow one of our most promising hunters to throw their life away as he did. For now, I must insist that you content yourself with the three-nut marks...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_052<tab>命を粗末にすることはありません。
これまで通り、上級モブを相手に堅実に稼ぐことをオススメします。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_055<tab>Nutsy, your fearless leader! Still alive and kupoing, I'll have you know!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_055<tab>しばらくぶりクポ、サイル！！
ナッツクラン頭領、ナッツ……帰還したクポ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_056<tab>But Halldor described in exacting detail how the beast snatched you out of the air─how as you struggled to free yourself in vain you were disemboweled and depommed─
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_056<tab>いえ、我がクランの頭領は、
リスキーモブとの戦いで死亡したと聞いております。
すでにハルドルから死亡届の書類も提出されていますし。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_057<tab>C-Certainly not! As you can see, I am the picture of perfect health, kupo!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_057<tab>ハルドルゥ！　勝手に殺すなクポォ！！
アタイはこのとおり、フワフワしてるクポォ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_058<tab>No thanks to that villain Halldor, though! I'd say <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> was the aspiring depommer, considering how many times he nearly chopped it off in the midst of our battle with that elite mark.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_058<tab>むしろ、アタイを殺そうとしたのはハルドルクポォ！
あの野郎、リスキーモブとの戦闘中を狙って、
アタイのポンポンをむしり取ろうとしたクポ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_059<tab>I rather think you have only yourself to blame for that. After all, was it not you who encouraged him and the others to strike you down and claim leadership?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_059<tab>いつものことではありませんか。
ナッツクランの頭領の座が欲しければ、
殺して奪ってみせろと仰ったのは貴方です。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_060<tab>Aye, aye, for the thrill of it! Which he gave me and then some─even if only by his poor attempts at treachery. That weakling wouldn't last a moment against me in a stand-up fight!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_060<tab>クポポポポポ！
身内から命を狙われるかもわからないスリル……たまらないクポォ！
死への恐怖だけがアタイを滾（たぎ）らせてくれるクポォォォ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_061<tab>As you may have gathered, it takes a certain...character to rise within the highest echelons of the clan.
target: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_061<tab>お察しの通り、我がクランにはこんな連中しかおりません。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_062<tab>You've got to eat, sleep, and breathe danger! You've got to love putting it all on the line against elite marks and elite hunters besides! You've got to be bloody mad! So congratulations, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>: you're in!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_062<tab>それはそうと、サイル！
そいつはリスキーモブに挑戦したがってるクポ！
モブハンターの邪魔をすることは許さんと言ってるクポ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_064<tab>Wise, shmise! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s a killer─I want to see <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> kill! I wanna see <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> die! Mwahahaha! More blood for Clan Nutsy! More blood, kupo!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_064<tab>戦いたいヤツは戦え！　死にたいヤツは死ね！
それがナッツクランの掟だと、忘れたとは言わせないクポ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_065<tab>It's <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> ridiculous philosophy that's losing us hunters by the boatload! How are we supposed to build a sustainable organization when you keep encouraging people to kill themselves in the most violent and pointless ways possible!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_065<tab>オメェェェがそんなこと言ってっからよォ！！
クラン員がゴミみてェにガンガン死んでいくんだろがィ！！！
経理を担当してるアタシの身にもなってみろやァ！！！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_066<tab>I─ Er. Well, you see... The thing is...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_066<tab>こいつは分が悪いクポね……。
ここで死ぬわけには行かない、逃げるクポ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_067<tab>Ahem! I just wanted to say that you may be the most promising new hunter I've seen in ages! Brilliant work out there, really marvelous. Jolly good! And on that note... Good-bye!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_NUTS_000_067<tab>アンタ……いい眼をしてるクポね……。
その眼は、戦いが好きで好きで仕方ない、狂戦士の眼だクポ……。
……なんて、ただ言ってみたかっただけだけどクポ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_068<tab>One day I'm going to rip that pom off your head and shove it down your godsdamned throat, you furry little shite...
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_069<tab>Anyway, you may now hunt elite marks. Do try not to die. And, if you happen to run into our fearless leader in the field, kill her.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_XYLLE_000_069<tab>ともあれ、仕方ありません。
貴方のリスキーモブへの挑戦を許可いたします。
くれぐれも、命を粗末にしないようお気をつけて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>You are now permitted to take bills for elite Clan Nutsy marks from the Clan Hunt board.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>クリスタリウムとユールモアの「ナッツボード」から、
「ナッツ・リスキーモブ手配書」を入手できるようになりました。

source: TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_075<tab>Heh heh heh! Don't let me keep you, killer! There's a whole wide world of elite marks waiting for you to kill them! Hop to!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYB004_03600_HALLDOR_000_075<tab>リスキーモブってのはな、
上級のモブですら比較にならないほどの強さを持ったモブのことだ。
次元が違う、なんてもんじゃねえ。
